title: Semantic chunking (embedding-based)
description:
Add embedding-based semantic chunking strategy:
1. Split text into sentences
2. Embed each sentence
3. Compare adjacent embeddings with cosine similarity
4. Split where similarity drops below threshold

Useful for long docs where topics aren't separated by clear formatting (legal docs, transcripts, prose).

Option: Arcana.ingest(text, repo: Repo, strategy: :semantic, similarity_threshold: 0.5)
